img_above_text:
![Wukong MiddleHollow 49.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e1/Wukong_MiddleHollow_49.jpg)
One particularly large cocoon seems to be grunting, but it's not the return of the Venom Daoist. Instead, give it a wack to find your old pal the Horse Guai on the next part of his adventure!
img_below_text:
Once again he'll thank you for your part in helping along his quest, and will hope to cross your path again at the Flaming Mountains, so look forward to that!
Talk to the Horse Guai some more to learn more of his story, and then head through the rest of the cocoon field, dealing with a few more Amourworms as you go.
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong MiddleHollow 49.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e1/Wukong_MiddleHollow_49.jpg)
One particularly large cocoon seems to be grunting, but it's not the return of the Venom Daoist. Instead, give it a wack to find your old pal the Horse Guai on the next part of his adventure!"
        - Following Text: "Once again he'll thank you for your part in helping along his quest, and will hope to cross your path again at the Flaming Mountains, so look forward to that!
Talk to the Horse Guai some more to learn more of his story, and then head through the rest of the cocoon field, dealing with a few more Amourworms as you go."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from *Black Myth: Wukong* where the protagonist interacts with the Horse Guai, a recurring character. The Horse Guai is seated in a cavernous area surrounded by cocoon-like formations and illuminated by a hanging torch. This encounter advances the Horse Guai's storyline, as he expresses gratitude for the player's assistance and hints at a future meeting at the Flaming Mountains. The setting emphasizes the game's atmospheric and mythical design.
